page.title: 13Changes in our eating habits
page.content: We did a survey to find out about how people's eating habits had changed over the past few years. Most people had changed from white bread to brown or wholemeal and have also changed from ordinary milk to skimmed or semi-skimmed milk. Most have less sweets now. They had changed from butter to margarine and they have cut down on salt. The people we met said they eat more fruit. When we asked people about how much sugar they took, about more than half of the people had cut down on sugar because they were worried about putting on weight. One or two people had changed the amount of sugar they took and they have also changed from white to brown sugar. They cut down or changed their eating habits because of health reasons.
